title: Simulation-Based Customer Service Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment to strengthen language domain (customer service) expertise. Combines offline simulations using personal devices with peer learning discussions.

learning_goals: Through online simulations based on real sales scenarios, over 90% of learners improve customer service skills by at least three levels.
In blended learning environments, over 80% of learners propose five or more customer service improvement plans through social interaction with peers.
By the end of the one-week course, over 75% of learners develop action plans to apply simulation learning outcomes to real-world tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
